'''''"Ironbeard"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Qucusaurus Warrior: Heartstar Hammer|text=Ironbeard â€” The Fire That Forges All}} without being hit by any attacks.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Ironbeard does not have any ranged attacks, and his AoE attacks are fairly easy to avoid. By keeping a distance, players can avoid getting hit by his attacks. Destroying the molten barbs will significantly speed up the fight.
